thread.title: Warriors’ Curry, Green on President Obama, Clippers’ statements
thread.title_full: Warriors’ Curry, Green on President Obama, Clippers’ statements - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Steve Kroner
title: Warriors’ Curry, Green on President Obama, Clippers’ statements
text: Two major topics of discussion after the Warriors’ shootaround Tuesday morning were the players’ interaction with President Obama in San Francisco on Saturday, and the Clippers’ recent statements intimating Golden State was somewhat lucky to win the NBA title in June.
